thread.title: Walmart shares drop further, brokerages cut price targets

title: Walmart shares drop further, brokerages cut price targets
text:
Walmart shares drop further, brokerages cut price targets 2:46am IST - 01:11 
Walmart shares continued their fall after the world's biggest retailer posted a sharp tumble in profit and online sales growth during the holiday season, and forecast lower annual profit. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
